name: Hide, or Die !
description:
In Hide, or Die, you're a secret agent trying to escape an unfriendly factory after his mission done. You'll have to run, jump and hide to avoid a mysterious weapon that could kill you any time ...

School work made in Unity by Anaïs Georges and Antoine Lefevre. This is a first experience on programmation. You may experience some issues on the Windows version, I'm currently trying to fix it.

Graphics by 0x72 : https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
